title: Need a Team To Play With Tonight!
body: I've recently have had some trouble getting out of b4. When I win I gain only 10 or so lp and when I lose I lose about 20-27 lp. I'm an ADC/TOP main with nice ADC win rates (Lucian, my main, 60% winrate). I'll be playing tonight at about 11pm to 1am today at Sydney time. Add me ingame with the name CarbonMini and comment down below which roles you can play. Thanks.

replies.body: Yo, add me GORDONNODROG Im S5 atm, Top and Jungle main. Looking to climb as well. :)

Jungle and top main

Add me: Vintron
Can play ADC/mid or support added you
